str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From hupo and ballo; to throw in stealthily, i.e. Introduce by collusion.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.
Slanderous; subst: a blasphemer. From a derivative of blapto and pheme; scurrilious, i.e. Calumnious, or impious.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Or Moses, or Mouses of Hebrew origin; Moseus, Moses, or Mouses, the Hebrew lawgiver.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
